mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEB(wb_no, wb_title, wb_content, wb_good, wb_file1, wb_file2, wb_size2, wb_cnt, wb_replycnt, wb_date, wb_indent, wb_ansnum) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(wb_no), 0) + 1 as wb_no FROM WEB), #{wb_title}, #{wb_content}, 0, #{wb_file1}, #{wb_file2}, #{wb_size2}, 0, 0, sysdate, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT wb_no, wb_title, wb_content, wb_good, wb_file1, wb_file2, wb_size2, wb_cnt, wb_replycnt, wb_date, wb_indent, wb_ansnum FROM WEB ORDER BY wb_no DESC
